title: A True story of one man and his bark
creator_credit: David Cobham Productions, Film Producers Guild and David Cobham
brief_description: Shows how a successful farmer needs to be a business man and takes the actual history of a farmer who progresses because of his business-like approach and the aid of the Midland Bank.
